alert.note: Alert for GUZ002; GUZ003; GUZ004 (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 26 at 5:49AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Guam, Rota, Tinian and Saipan. * WHEN...Through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Due to the proximity of a tropical disturbance, which is currently situated near Saipan, more substantial rainfall is anticipated the next few days. Satellite analysis, model guidance and previous trends indicate possibility for rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches through Wednesday. Localized training cells can bring up to 4 to 6 inches of rainfall. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
